page_content: Discusses the distinction between tax-deductible and non-deductible expenses for self-employed individuals.
Provides information on declaring various types of capital assets, including cryptocurrencies, in tax returns.
Discusses the tax-deductible medical and accident costs in Switzerland.
Provides information on how educational organizations can apply for consulting support in various areas including finance and marketing.
Explains the difference in rental values between federal and cantonal levels in Switzerland.
